ygData.subject: Re: Off Topic
ygData.msgSnippet: Check this out!  My roommate and I were playing EQ (2 accounts 2 pc s) He is a Highelf Wizard and im a wood elf ranger...well AT MY OWN GUILDHOUSE in kelethin
ygData.messageBody:
Check this out! My roommate and I were playing EQ (2 accounts 2 pc's) He is
a Highelf Wizard and im a wood elf ranger...well AT MY OWN GUILDHOUSE in
kelethin i was getting ripped off! We have the same charisma (80) and he
was getting stuff for about 5sp to 1gp cheaper! WTF?
Is there some logical explanination for this? (we were both 3rd level and
dindt have much of a faction adjustment quite yet)


>Merchants are racists. Even in your guildhouse do they rip you. Over the
>8th level spells, I spare almost a platinum by going back to Felwithe
>over the Freeport prices.
>
